mapper.select: select a.id,a.no,a.datetime,a.weight,a.materials,a.water_content,a.company_id,a.price,a.stor_no,a.meminfo,a.edit_user_id,a.delete_state,b.material_name as materialsName,usr.u_name from wh_incoming_material as a left join dic_materials b on a.materials=b.id LEFT JOIN u_user usr ON a.edit_user_id = usr.user_id and usr.delete_state = 1 where a.delete_state=1

select a.id,a.no,a.datetime,a.weight,a.materials,a.water_content,a.company_id,a.price,a.stor_no,a.meminfo,a.edit_user_id,a.delete_state,b.material_name as materialsName from wh_incoming_material as a left join dic_materials b on a.materials=b.id where id=#{id} and a.delete_state=1
mapper.update: update wh_incoming_material set no=#{wm.no}, datetime=#{wm.datetime}, weight=#{wm.weight}, materials=#{wm.materials}, water_content=#{wm.waterContent}, company_id=#{wm.companyId}, price=#{wm.price}, stor_no=#{wm.storNo}, meminfo=#{wm.meminfo}, edit_user_id=#{wm.editUserId} where id=#{wm.id}
update wh_incoming_material set delete_state=0 where id=#{id}
